title: Third Law of Motion
description: Write a program that, given a force being exerted, returns the force exerted on the object who exerted the argument force. More commonly known as: Newton's third law of motion.

title: Multiply Two Numbers
description: Write a program that takes two numbers as input and returns their product.

title: Square a Number
description: Write a program that takes a number as input and returns its square.

title: Check Even or Odd
description: Write a program that takes a number as input and returns whether it is even or odd.

title: Reverse a String
description: Write a program that takes a string as input and returns the string reversed.

title: Find Maximum of Three Numbers
description: Write a program that takes three numbers as input and returns the maximum of the three.

title: Calculate Factorial
description: Write a program that takes a number as input and returns its factorial.
